posts.post_content:
A lot of people don't understand just how powerful Clone is. Here, let me share it's hidden ability:  
Clone 3U Sorcery  
Destroy target legendary creature. This spell can target legendary creatures with hexproof and shroud.  
  
Think about how awesome that is for EDH. Yeah.

posts.post_content:
This is my favorite card in the game right now. Oh, you have a $120 [Tarmogoyf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tarmogoyf)? Me too! Mine looks like a $0.20 rare though. Oh, your legendary creature has shroud? Good thing my [Clone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Clone) doesn't target!  
  
My favorite interaction in the world is a [Clone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Clone) dropped into a [Mimic Vat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mimic Vat). It's always fun being able to pop out copies of anything in play for 3c.
posts.html:

Posted By: Munchaus (2/16/2013 11:56:08 PM)

posts.post_content: I've yet to be disappointed when I play this. Copy your own creature, copy theirs. Flicker it. Whatever. It removes hexproof legends (and there are a couple of pesky ones available) or just plain old legendary creatures. It's annoyingly good in EDH , and is a solid card. I think it's a great choice for a reprint, especially after [Phantasmal Image](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phantasmal Image) broke clone effects. Well, the Image and [Sun Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sun Titan), that is.
